item.title: Computershare 启动投资参与业务，为北美地区招聘高管
item.description: 全球金融服务公司Computershare表示，公司管理团队正在就如何处理股东关系寻求更多建议，包括改进股东关系的要求，Computershare正在推出一项投资者参与业务，并聘请了摩根大通的一名高管。【原文：Computershare is launching an investor engagement business and hired a JPMorgan Chase executive at a time corporate management teams are looking for more advice on how to handle shareholder relations, including demands for improvements, the global financial services company said.】

item.title: Disney+ 与《金钱大劫案》制作方 Atresmedia 签订流媒体协议
item.description: 迪斯尼公司周一表示，美国娱乐巨头华特-迪斯尼公司与西班牙媒体集团 Atresmedia 签署了一项协议，将其内容整合到流媒体平台 Disney+。【原文：U.S. entertainment giant Walt Disney signed an agreement with Spanish media group Atresmedia to integrate its contents into streaming platform Disney+, Disney said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲最大车展拉开帷幕，特朗普和中国成为焦点
item.description: 周一，各大汽车制造商在慕尼黑车展上展示了最新车型，推出了新型电动汽车和低成本车型，因为欧洲汽车业正在与关税上调、成本上升以及在本土与中国企业的竞争等危机作斗争。【原文：Major automakers showcased their latest models at the Munich car show on Monday, unveiling new EVs and lower-cost models as Europe's auto sector fights crises ranging from tariff hikes to rising costs and rivalry with Chinese firms on their home turf.】

item.title: 英国 PRS 房地产投资信托基金称 KKR 已加入出售程序，Long Harbour 的竞标仍在进行中
item.description: 英国房地产投资信托公司 PRS REIT 周一表示，KKR 已加入其正式出售程序，房地产投资商龙港（Long Harbour）已参与竞标，但补充说，这家美国私募股权公司尚未提出报价。【原文：British real estate investment trust PRS REIT on Monday said KKR joined its formal sale process that already involves a bid from property investor Long Harbour, but added that the U.S. private equity firm had not made an offer.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，中国推动东盟签署贸易协定升级版
item.description: 中国商务部副部长颜东周一表示，中国正在推动东南亚国家联盟在今年年底前签署自由贸易协定升级版，因为在美国加征关税之际，中国政府正寻求实现出口多样化。【原文：China is pushing the Association of Southeast Asian Nations to sign an upgrade to their free trade agreement before the end of the year, Vice Commerce Minister Yan Dong said on Monday, as Beijing seeks to diversify its exports amid U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲区负责人表示，Stellantis 将放弃到 2030 年实现 100% 电动汽车的目标
item.description: 法意汽车制造商 Stellantis 扩大欧洲业务主管让-菲利浦-伊姆帕拉托（Jean-Philippe Imparato）周一表示，将不再追求到 2030 年只生产电动汽车的目标，并补充说，该公司即将推出的名为 "敢于向前 "的战略计划中的其他目标可能会保留。【原文：Franco-Italian carmaker Stellantis will no longer pursue a target of producing only electric vehicles by 2030, said Jean-Philippe Imparato, head of enlarged Europe, on Monday, adding that other goals in its upcoming strategic plan known as 'Dare Forward" may remain.】

item.title: 独家报道日本聘请伍德麦肯兹评估特朗普支持的阿拉斯加液化天然气项目
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，日本已聘请能源咨询公司伍德麦肯兹（Wood Mackenzie）对拟议中的800英里阿拉斯加天然气管道和液化天然气工厂进行评估，这表明日本正在权衡是否支持美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）吹捧的这个价值440亿美元的项目。【原文：Japan has hired energy consultancy Wood Mackenzie to assess a proposed 800-mile Alaska gas pipeline and LNG plant in a sign it is weighing support for the $44 billion project touted by U.S. President Donald Trump, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国电动车和混合动力车销量增速为 18 个月来最慢
item.description: 随着中国政府继续努力制止惩罚性的价格战，中国 8 月份电动汽车和混合动力汽车的销量增速为一年半以来最慢。【原文：China's August sales of electric vehicles and hybrids grew at the slowest pace in one and a half years as the government continues efforts to halt punishing price wars.】

item.title: 由于关税影响，世界银行将越南经济增长预期下调至 6.6
item.description: 世界银行周一下调了对越南经济增长的预测，原因是有证据表明美国的关税开始对这个东南亚出口国的货运产生影响。【原文：The World Bank on Monday trimmed its forecast for Vietnam's economic growth on evidence that U.S. tariffs were starting to have an impact on the Southeast Asian exporter's shipments.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官：迄今为止，关税已导致集团损失数十亿美元
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司首席执行官周一表示，到目前为止，美国关税已使该公司损失数十亿欧元，并补充说，其主要品牌保时捷正受到关税和疲软的中国市场 "三明治 "的挤压。【原文：U.S. tariffs have cost Volkswagen , Europe's largest carmaker, billions of euros so far, its chief executive said on Monday, adding that its key brand Porsche was being squeezed in a "sandwich" of duties and a weak Chinese market.】

item.title: 西班牙 BBVA 银行以 148 亿欧元收购萨瓦德尔银行
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）周一正式启动了对规模较小的竞争对手萨瓦德尔（Sabadell）148 亿欧元（173.4 亿美元）的恶意收购。【原文：Spain's BBVA on Monday formally launched a 14.8 billion euros ($17.34 billion) hostile takeover bid for smaller rival Sabadell .】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国权衡三星和海力士的中国芯片年度供应许可
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，美国正在提议每年批准向三星电子和 SK 海力士在中国的工厂出口芯片制造用品。【原文：The United States is proposing annual approvals for exports of chipmaking supplies to Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix's China-based factories, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国贸易部长称，韩国在敲定美国贸易协议时将参考日本协议
item.description: 韩国财政部长周一表示，韩国在谈判 7 月底达成的本国贸易协议的最终细节时，将参考日本与美国的贸易协议。【原文：South Korea will take into account Japan's trade agreement with the United States as a reference as it negotiates final details of its own trade deal struck in late July, the finance minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 英国芯片供应商 IQE 扩大审查范围，考虑出售公司的可能性
item.description: 苹果供应商 IQE 周一表示，已扩大战略审查范围，考虑出售公司的可能性。【原文：Apple supplier IQE said on Monday it has expanded the scope of its strategic review to consider a potential sale of the company.】

item.title: 德国出口意外下降而工业生产上升
item.description: 周一的数据显示，德国 7 月份出口意外下降，而工业产出却有所增长。【原文：German exports unexpectedly fell in July while industrial output rose, data showed on Monday.】

item.title: Uber 和 Momenta 明年将在慕尼黑开始自动驾驶测试
item.description: 优步（Uber）和中国自动驾驶技术公司Momenta周一宣布，计划明年在德国测试4级自动驾驶汽车，在竞争日趋激烈的情况下，该打车平台正努力扩大其机器人出租车的覆盖范围。【原文：Uber and China-based self-driving tech firm Momenta announced plans on Monday to test level 4 autonomous vehicles in Germany next year, as the ride-hailing platform seeks to expand its robotaxi footprint amid rising competition.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印度首席经济顾问称，特朗普的关税可能使印度国内生产总值减少 0.5
item.description: 印度首席经济顾问阿南塔-纳格斯瓦兰（V. Anantha Nageswaran）周一在接受彭博电视采访时表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度征收50%的关税可能会使印度今年的国内生产总值减少半个百分点。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's 50% tariffs on India could reduce the country's gross domestic product by half a percent this year, the nation's Chief Economic Adviser V. Anantha Nageswaran said in a Bloomberg TV interview on Monday.】

item.title: RWE 向投资者 Apollo 筹集 32 亿欧元电网资金
item.description: RWE 周一表示，投资者阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）同意出资 32 亿欧元（37.5 亿美元），用于 RWE 持有的德国输电系统运营商 Amprion 25.1% 的股份所带来的未来电网升级。【原文：RWE said on Monday that investor Apollo Global Management agreed to contribute 3.2 billion euros ($3.75 billion) for future power-grid upgrades that arise from RWE's 25.1% stake in German transmission system operator Amprion.】

item.title: 自动驾驶玩家 QCraft 将在德国设立欧洲总部
item.description: 中国自动驾驶解决方案制造商 QCraft 周一表示，将在德国设立欧洲总部，并与美国芯片公司高通公司（Qualcomm）合作。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving solutions maker QCraft said on Monday that it will open its European headquarters in Germany and is partnering with U.S. chip company Qualcomm .】

item.title: 互联网监测员称土耳其限制访问 X、YouTube 等网络平台
item.description: 全球互联网监测机构 Netblocks 周一表示，在土耳其，包括 X、YouTube、Instagram、Facebook、TikTok 和 WhatsApp 在内的多个网络平台的访问受到限制。【原文：Netblocks, a global internet monitor, said on Monday that access to online platforms including X, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and WhatsApp has been restricted in Turkey on multiple networks.】

item.title: 中国电商企业正被价格战 "蹂躏
item.description: 中国主要网络公司为赢得 "即时零售 "大战而展开的激烈争夺，预计将进一步压低它们的中短期利润，并加剧世界第二大经济体的通货紧缩压力。【原文：The bitter battle among China's major online companies to win the "instant retail" war is expected to further depress their short- to medium-term profits and contribute to deflationary pressures in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 聚焦：西班牙电信期待并购为欧洲电信业带来更广阔的前景
item.description: 西班牙电信集团 Telefonica 首席执行官马克-穆特拉（Marc Murtra）为欧洲电信业描绘了更广阔的愿景，该公司正寻求购买电信资产，并通过出售其拉丁美洲西班牙语资产来释放资源。【原文：Spanish telecoms group Telefonica is looking to buy telecom assets and free up resources by selling its Spanish-speaking Latin American assets, as CEO Marc Murtra plots a broader vision for Europe's telco sector.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商在慕尼黑车展上直面关税和中国竞争
item.description: 在欧洲汽车业面临美国提高关税、电气化成本高昂以及中国汽车制造商在本土扩张等危机之际，各大汽车制造商将于周一在慕尼黑车展上展示其最新车型。【原文：Major automakers will showcase their latest models at Munich's car show on Monday as Europe's automotive sector faces crises ranging from U.S. tariff hikes to costly electrification and the expansion of Chinese automakers on their home turf.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将在韩国 "大力投资 "炼油和石化行业
item.description: 美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）的一位高管周一在亚太石油大会上表示，该公司预计将在韩国 "大力投资 "炼油和石化行业。【原文：Chevron expects to go "investment heavy" in South Korea on refining and petrochemicals, an executive with the U.S. oil major said at the Asia Pacific Petroleum Conference on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞标从一场政治风波到另一场政治风波
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee:】

item.title: 中国写字楼开发商提供优惠、降低租金吸引租户
item.description: 中国的商业地产开发商在与全国各地屡创新高的空置率作斗争的同时，正试图通过提供增值服务吸引租户，例如除了降低租金外，还为电动汽车充电提供补贴。【原文：Chinese commercial property developers are seeking to lure tenants with value-added services such as subsidies for charging electric vehicles in addition to lower rents, as they battle record-high vacancy rates across the country.】

item.title: 香港加密货币交易所 HashKey 将推出 5 亿美元的数字财政基金
item.description: 香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所 HashKey Group 周一表示，该公司将推出首只以数字资产财政（DAT）为重点的基金，初始目标规模为 5 亿美元。【原文：HashKey Group will launch its inaugural Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) focused fund with an initial target size of $500 million, Hong Kong's largest licensed crypto exchange said on Monday.】

item.title: 报告称，特朗普政策导致美国太阳能安装量预测下降
item.description: 一个重要的贸易组织周一在一份报告中说，与唐纳德-特朗普总统的税法通过之前相比，美国太阳能产业在2026年至2030年期间的装机容量有可能减少27%。【原文：The U.S. solar industry is at risk of installing 27% less capacity between 2026 and 2030 than before the passage of President Donald Trump's tax law that rolled back subsidies for such projects, a key trade group said in a report on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道白宫施压，美国 FDA 将快速审查尼古丁袋
item.description: 根据路透社看到的会议记录，在特朗普政府要求加快审批速度的压力下，美国食品和药物管理局计划在周一启动的一项试点计划中对四家烟草公司的尼古丁袋进行快速审查。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration plans to fast-track reviews of four tobacco firms' nicotine pouches in a pilot program launching on Monday, amid pressure from the Trump administration to speed up approvals, according to meeting transcripts seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国就业数据疲软，StanChart 将美联储 9 月降息预期下调至 50 个基点
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周五在一份报告中称，在8月份就业增长远低于预期、失业率升至4.3%之后，渣打银行预计美国联邦储备委员会将在9月17日的会议上降息50个基点。【原文：Standard Chartered expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates by 50 basis points at its September 17 meeting, after August jobs growth came in far below expectations and unemployment rose to 4.3%, it said in a note on Friday.】
